sentences.en: All prices are inclusive of delivery.
sentences.cn: 所有的价格都包括运费在内。

sentences.en: An all-inclusive two-week holiday costs around £880 per person.
sentences.cn: 为期两周、包括所有费用的度假大约每人花费880英镑。

sentences.en: Not everyone shares his vision of an inclusive America.
sentences.cn: 不是所有人都同意他的观点，认为美国是个包容性很强的国家。

sentences.en: Our office is open from Monday to Friday inclusive.
sentences.cn: 我们办公室从星期一到星期五办公.

sentences.en: Remarks: Rates are inclusive of service charge and free Internet.
sentences.cn: 房价已含服务费,免费宽带上网.

sentences.en: The academy is far more inclusive now than it used to be.
sentences.cn: 该学会的包容性比过去强了很多。

sentences.en: The bill is inclusive of the food and lodging.
The discussion in this section is not intended to be an all - inclusive review of the subject.
sentences.cn: 本节的讨论并不企图对这个题目作无所不包的评述.

sentences.en: The fully inclusive fare for the trip is £22.
sentences.cn: 这次出行的全部费用为22英镑。

sentences.en: The group can be large, small, inclusive , exclusive, formal or informal.
sentences.cn: 这个参照体可大可小, 可以是容他性的也可以是排他性的; 可以是正式的、或非正式的.

sentences.en: The monthly rent is $ 15, inclusive of light and water.
sentences.cn: 每月租金15美元, 包括水电费在内.

sentences.en: The monthly rent is $ 20 inclusive of everything.
sentences.cn: 月房租总共二十美元,包括一切费用在内.
一切开支全都包括在内了.

sentences.en: The rent is $ 300, inclusive of heating.
sentences.cn: 房租三百元, 包括暖气费在内.

sentences.en: The rent is £120 a week, inclusive of heating.
sentences.cn: 房租连暖气费在内是每星期120英镑。

sentences.en: Therefore, the all inclusive term endocytosis is now coming into common use for this process.
sentences.cn: 因此, 这个过程现在通常用一概括的名词--内吞作用来命名.

sentences.en: This price is inclusive of 5 % commission.
sentences.cn: 本价格包括5%的佣金在内.

sentences.en: Training will commence on 5 October, running from Tuesday to Saturday inclusive.
sentences.cn: 培训将于10月5日开始，从星期二（含）到星期六（含）。

sentences.en: You are also invited to join us on our prayer days (this year, June 6 to June 14 inclusive).
sentences.cn: 你也受邀加入我们的祷告日（今年从6月6日（含）至6月14日（含））。

words.tran_cn: 包括（include的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 无所不包的；包括一切的；总括

trans.tran_cn: 包括的，包罗广泛的，包括…的，一切开支包括在内的，（语言使用上）不分男女的
trans.tran_en: an inclusive price or cost includes everything
